definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_isalive"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="world_data_isday"></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_despawn"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="controls_repeat_ext"><value name="TIMES"><block type="math_random_number_between"><value name="min"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="max"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO"><block type="spawn_entity"><field name="entity">CUSTOM:Angler</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
